scripts.say: Perhaps because of the efforts lead by Saratoga's group, fewer Sirens were coming at us than expected.
Ideally, we'd be able to join forces before launching our main offensive against the Siren stronghold...
Hopefully that wouldn't be too optimistic...
Comrade, you ought to take a break and eat. After all, "a healthy body houses a healthy mind."
Our offerings may not be as sumptuous as the Royal Navy or the Sakura Empire, but it should be enough to fill the stomach.
Laid out in front of me was karavai bread, canned tushonka, caviar, and...
Commander, would you like some borscht?
Hot borscht kept in an insulated container, and a chocolate milk blend on the side.
What about this meal wasn't sumptuous?
I see you have quite the appetite~ Commander, I think you'd fit in great here.
Take this time to get some rest before the upcoming battle.
That's right. It's hard to stay warm in this cold weather, so please drink up.
It's a classic. Nothing beats vodka for staving off the cold. Of course, you're welcome to have something else if you don't drink.
"It's part of the fun of the Northern Parliament," or something along those lines.
